name: Pussy Bow Maxi, Wildflower
description:
SALE! Was $159.00

Tie neck maxi dress featuring a center front split to knee and pretty pleated flounce sleeve. The side seam ties allow for subtle waist definition, otherwise slap on a stretchy wide belt to really show off the curves. The column shape elongates the frame, especially when worn with heels. Dress it down with flats for day to day wear, or accessorize with belt and platforms for a night out.

The tie at neck can be left undone, or tied low and loose for a casual look and a more open neckline.

Shown here with chocolate Rosette Belt.

Fibre content – polyester

Care – hand wash or cool gentle machine wash inside laundry bag. Line dry. Cool iron if necessary.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Request your loved one's favourite colour. If you'd like to purchase an amount not shown below, please use the contact form to request a specific amount be posted for you to purchase.

An amount less than the gift voucher's value may not be spent online - ie the value of your selections must be equal to or greater than the value of your gift voucher. You will receive a hard copy of the voucher in the post which includes a unique online code to use once.

However if you plan to shop in store (not online), an amount less than the total voucher value may be spent and the remainder held over until your next purchase.

As a gift voucher is like cash, this will be sent registered post to ensure safe arrival (hence the postage charge).

If you'd like the voucher to be sent to an address other than that of the purchaser, please include a detailed message at checkout.

This backless design is perfect for a summer event. Its cinched waist and sweetheart neckline evokes the femininity of the 50s. Throw a tulle skirt on underneath for real drama! The elasticated strip at the back ensures a snug, comfortable fit, with a centre back invisible zip and a hook and eye closure.

The Duck Egg Blue version of this dress was worn by Taylor Swift to a performance in London in August 2009.

Fibre content – 100% Japanese cotton.

Care – cool gentle machine wash inside laundry bag, remove bow brooches prior to laundering.

description:

Dress it down with flats for day to day wear, or accessorize with belt and platforms for a night out.

The tie at neck can be left undone, or tied low and loose for a casual look and a more open neckline.

Stretchy slips are available to purchase as a set for $189, or buy the maxi on its own for $149 if you've got your own slip. "Nude" or "Black" slips are recommended with this colourway. Slips can be purchased alone for $59 - see separate entry.

The lower layer of the sleeve is cut in the same fabric as the body whilst the top layer is cut in a contrasting lace. Looks great teamed with the Waistcoat, or wear just with a pair of jeans and ballet slippers. Great for tucking into high-waisted pants and skirts, or throw it on with a pair of jeans for a cute and comfy weekend option.

Fibre content – polyester elastane

Care – cool gentle machine wash inside laundry bag.

Wear with – Waistcoat; Lazy Jacket; 50s Skirt; Str8 Leg Pant; A-Line Skirt; Bustle Skirt; Darted Skirt; jeans.

*Fit tip – This is a close-fitting top so if you don't like body-hugging shapes, you can always go up a size. Otherwise if you're looking for a belly-camouflaging design, this may not be the top for you. However it is cut with a generous length to the body so a certain amount of ruching/gathering over the belly is possible and this is always a flattering look.

Designed and made in Sydney, Australia.

name: Antoinette Top, Black
description:
Stretch jersey top featuring a puffed and gathered upper sleeve, contrasted and complimented by a very fitted lower sleeve. The square neckline is very flattering on most body shapes and works particularly well worn under the Waistcoat.

The jersey fabric has a beautiful soft handle and a good amount of stretch contributing to its comfort and longevity. 

Fibre content – viscose/elastane

Care – cool gentle machine wash inside laundry bag 

Wear with – Waistcoat; Lazy Jacket; Darted Skirt; Str8 Leg Pants

*Fit tip – This is a close-fitting top so if you don't like body-hugging shapes, you can always go up a size. Otherwise if you're looking for a belly-camouflaging design, this may not be the top for you. It is cut with a generous length to the body so a certain amount of ruching/gathering over the belly is possible and this is always a flattering look.

Designed and made in Sydney, Australia.

name: Stepford Sundress, a la TAYLOR SWIFT
description:
COMING SOON!!!

Please note that the fabrics will be different - the floral Taylor's dress was made from is no longer available. 

Halter neck neck cotton floral sundress featuring contrast stripe ribbon straps and hem detail. The two bow brooches are detachable for laundering or to pin to another garment. This backless design is perfect for a warm summer's day, and the 100% cotton fabric's vintage floral print evokes the femininity of the 50s. The elasticated strip at the back ensures a snug, comfortable fit. Centre back invisible zip and a hook and eye closure.

The Duck Egg Blue version of this dress was worn by Taylor Swift to a performance in London in August 2009. Please note the dress Taylor Swift wore is shorter and has an extra band of yellow ribbon at the hem. 

Fibre content – 100% cotton

Care – cool gentle machine wash inside laundry bag, remove bow brooches prior to laundering.

Measurements (in cms)
Size 6: SOLD OUT
Size 8: SOLD OUT
Size 10: SOLD OUT Waist 80, (directly) Under bust 84, Length (waist to hem) 58
Size 12: SOLD OUT

Designed and made in Sydney, Australia.

name: Darted Skirt, Bordeaux
description:
Satin-lined skirt featuring double darts, side and back godets, contrast ivory trim on hem and invisible zipper at centre back. This skirt is designed to sit somewhere between the natural waist and hip (depending on your preference) – where it sits depends on what size you choose. A smaller size will sit higher, a larger size will drop further down on the hip. The skirt sits close to the body from the waist to the hip and then flares from the end of the darts to the hem. The fabric has a beautiful drape and its slightly stretchy quality allows for maximum comfort.

Fibre content – polyester/viscose/elastane

Care – hand wash 

Wear with – Waistcoat; Lazy Jacket; L.S. Frill Ts; Antoinette Tops, Frill Sleeve Ts; Keyhole Frill Top

Measurements (in cms)
Size   6: SOLD OUT Waistband 71, Hip   95, CF Length 63, CB Length 64
Size   8: SOLD OUT Waistband 76, Hip 100, CF Length 63, CB Length 64
Size 10: SOLD OUT Waistband 81, Hip 105, CF Length 63, CB Length 64
Size 12: Waistband 86, Hip 110, CF Length 63, CB Length 64
Size 14: Waistband 91, Hip 115, CF Length 63, CB Length 64

*Fit tip – These skirts are quite generously cut, so most gals have been going DOWN a size. For example, if you're normally a size 12, choose a size 10.

Designed and made in Sydney, Australia.

name: Bustle Skirt, Black
description:
High-waisted knee-length pencil skirt featuring frilled layered bustle at the back trimmed with contrast satin binding. It is designed to sit on the smallest part of the waist. All Bustle Skirts are cut in stretch fabrics making its narrow, hip-hugging design more comfortable. The fabric is a medium weight high quality cotton polyester sateen and it therefore a little shiny. Invisible zip in side seam. Wear with heels for an evening out or with ankle/long boots during the day. This skirt works beautifully with both the Waistcoat and the Lazy Jacket. 

Fibre content – cotton/polyester/elastane

Care – cool gentle machine wash inside laundry bag 

Wear with – Waistcoat; Lazy Jacket; Keyhole Frill Top; Antoinette Top; Frill Sleeve T; Long Sleeve Frill T

name: Flared Skirt, Red Pinstripe Denim
description:
Six gored skirt cut to fit nice and snug at the waist and super flared at the hem. The ivory coloured binding trimming the hem highlights the generous folds of fabric.

Can be worn a little lower on the hip if a larger size is selected. Choose your waist size to have it sit high on your natural waist, or one size bigger if you'd prefer it to sit a little lower.

FABRIC
Cotton/poly/elastane denim

CARE
Gentle cool machine wash separately inside laundry bag.

name: Lazy Jacket, Grey Denim
description:
Fully-lined fitted double-breasted tailored jacket featuring necktie neckline, contrast piping, shaped peplum, contrast lining and unusual button configuration. This jacket is highly flattering on all body shapes and can be worn in many different ways. The slim-line sleeve and nipped-in waist is perfect for highlighting the female form, be you curvy or slender. The fitted shoulder with subtle padding will not date. This jacket looks best worn tight so be warned – this is not a style to do the housework in! When buttoned up it restricts arm movement a tad due to the narrow sleeve and fitted waist. Simply unbutton to allow greater movement of the arms. Wear buttoned up for a more formal occasion or open and floppy with jeans for a more relaxed look.

Fibre content – cotton/polyester

Care – Dry Clean Only

Wear with – Bustle Skirt; Waistcoat; Str8 Leg Pant; Dart Skirt; A-Line skirt

Measurements (in cms)
Size   8: Bust    87, Waist  73, Sleeve    60, Shoulder 39, Bk neck to hem 60 SOLD OUT
Size 10: Bust    92, Waist  78, Sleeve    61, Shoulder 40, Bk neck to hem 61 SOLD OUT
Size 12: SOLD OUT Bust    97, Waist  83, Sleeve 61.5, Shoulder 41, Bk neck to hem 61.5
Size 14: Bust  101, Waist  88, Sleeve    62, Shoulder 42, Bk neck to hem 62.5 SOLD OUT

*Fit tip – This jacket can be made bigger or smaller simply by moving the buttons towards or away from centre front respectively. The fit can be altered a whole size up or down in this manner.

Designed and made in Sydney, Australia.
